live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41920.summary: Some customers in Dawson Creek and Fort St. John are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41920.title: Sept 18 - Northern BC | All Service - Outage (Fix in Progress)

41919.affected_area: Lower Mainland (Maple Ridge, Surrey, North Vancouver, South Vancouver, East Vancouver)
live_updates: Some areas are starting to come back online while technicians continue with repairs and power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
BC Hydro is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.
Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area.
41919.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland (Maple Ridge, Surrey, North Vancouver, South Vancouver, East Vancouver)  are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41919.title: Sept 17 - Lower Mainland (Various)  | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41921.summary: Some customers in the Clearbrook area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41921.title: Sept 18 – Abbotsford (Clearbrook) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
